p: Four-week-old male WT C57BL/6 mice were treated with 0.2 mg of MAR1-5A3 (anti-Ifnar1 antibody) prior to inoculation with 10 3 FFU of WT RRV T48 strain in the footpad. The following day, 100 Î¼g of RRV antibody or an isotype control antibody to an unrelated viral target was administered to mice by intraperitoneal injection. Mice were observed over the course of 21 days for survival and moribund mice were euthanized.
